name: There Are Two Things
description:
This game will not let you in unless you are Jakob*. Read below. 

_____________________________________________________

Jakob, I hope it is you who is reading this. I understand that making this public allows other people into our lives. I understand that you might not like that. But this is the only way. I tried to contact you on Facebook and you never replied. So what am I supposed to do?

Well, I decided to make it public. Trying to get people's attention. So you will also see it. And it worked. 

Look, you always said you like art & computer games. So I tried to make something on the boundary. For you. I spend months working on this. Please take the time to look at this. What else can I do?

_____________________________________________________

If you are not Jakob then please help me to make this public. Get the attention it needs. You can even play the game! I mean, the game won't let you in far... But you can play until it kicks you out. Just so you know this is real. To convince yourself that what you are promoting is not a scam. But then please help me. Message Jakob on Facebook. Comment on the page, tweet it out. Whatever you can come up with. 

The game is completely free. There are no ads, no hidden costs. But there is also no money left for marketing. So I try, hoping for the best.

_____________________________________________________

This is a personal short story. You need headphones or speakers.
Press TAB for the in-game menu. W A S D to move. Mouse to look.

_____________________________________________________

*or are friends with him which in theory could allow you to bypass the questions. Sorry, Jakob! I didn't know how to prevent it. But maybe it's good that your friends get to know the real story...
